snippet.title: Random DOS Game Show #830: Wrath of Earth (1995)
snippet.description: Wrath of Earth is FPS meets Mech game meets Immersive Sim and is almost completely unheard of! Dave Faller's futuristic post-apocalyptic world is full of giant robots and mutated creatures attempting to hunt you down. You've sworn vengeance for what they've done, but unfortunately Lawnie is at the helm of this intriguing game. He shoots some things, gets confused by his suit layout, and has a great time overall. Recommended!
